isis.stitle: HOOD, GRILLE, FENDERS, BUMPER AND RUNNING BOARDS - MXT - ADJUSTMENTS - Hood Stop/Fender Extension ADJUSTMENT and Alignment

svcproc.title: Hood Stop/Fender Extension ADJUSTMENT and Alignment
svcproc.para: The Hood Stop brackets precisely control the location of the two hood stops and the adjustment of the fender extensions relative to the doors.
Refer to Figure 51 for the following procedure.

step1.para: Unlatch hood and tilt hood forward.
Locate the hood stop bracket using the locating fixture as shown.

note.para: Hood stop bracket bolts must be loosened and 2 bolts removed to insert the fixture.

step1.para: Tighten the 2 hood stop bracket bolts not removed.
Remove the locating fixture. Install and tighten the remaining 2 hood stop bracket bolts previously removed.
The same procedure should be applied to mount the opposite side hood stop bracket.
